mapper.insert: insert into concert_info (concert_number, subject, user_id, summary, content, concert_date, place_name, place_x, place_y, info_file_path) values (seq_concert.nextval, #{subject}, #{user_id}, #{summary}, #{content}, to_date(#{concert_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{place_name}, #{place_x}, #{place_y}, #{info_file_path})
mapper.select: select file_path from concert_file where concert_number = #{concert_number}
